preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 20 g of Germanium using an analytical balance.
2. Weigh out 20 g of Lead.
3. Weigh out 20 g of Tin.
4. Weigh out 120 g of Zirconium.
5. Combine all weighed materials in a clean, dry mixing bowl.
